view.class: oak-class oak-icon {{ name === '' ? '' : 'oak-icon-' + name }} {{ color === '' || color === 'primary' || color === 'info' || color === 'error' || color === 'success' || color === 'warning' ? 'oak-icon__' + (color || 'primary') : ''}} {{ custom }}
view.style: font-size: {{ size }}px; {{ color && color !== 'primary' && color !== 'info'&& color !== 'error'&& color !== 'success'&& color !== 'warning' ? 'color:' + color : '' }}
